sections.name: Hrungul Ironeye
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Dwarf
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the dwarf ancestry. Dwarves are stout folk who often live underground and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by dwarves. An item with this trait is created and used by dwarves.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

link.name: Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 55
link.alt: Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 55

gear.name: minor sturdy shield with +1 striking shield boss

automatic_abilities.name: Bravery
automatic_abilities.text: When the Hrungul rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, he gets a critical success instead. In addition, any time he gains the frightened condition, reduce its value by 1.

universal_monster_ability.name: Attack of Opportunity
universal_monster_ability.trigger: A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.
universal_monster_ability.effect: The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

universal_monster_ability.name: Shield Block
universal_monster_ability.trigger: The monster has its shield raised and takes damage from a physical attack
universal_monster_ability.effect: The monster snaps its shield into place to deflect a blow. The shield prevents the monster from taking an amount of damage up to the shield's Hardness. The monster and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than its listed type. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon with versatile S can deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you attack.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Thrown
traits.text: You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack; it is a ranged weapon when thrown. You add your Strength modifier to damage as you would for a melee weapon. When this trait appears on a melee weapon, it also includes the range increment. Ranged weapons with this trait use the range increment in the weapon’s Range entry.

ability.name: Double Slice
ability.text: Hrungul makes a longsword Strike, followed by a shield boss Strike against the same target at a –2 penalty, each using his current multiple attack penalty. If both attacks hit, he combines their damage and applies resistances and weaknesses only once. This counts as two attacks when calculating his multiple attack penalty.

ability.name: Grim Efficiency

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target’s mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

traits.name: Visual
traits.text: A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.

ability.trigger: A foe within 30 feet critically fails a Strike against Hrungul or targets Hrungul with an effect against which he critically succeeds at the saving throw
ability.effect: Hrungul's defense displays his effortless military skill, unsettling the triggering foe. He attempts to Demoralize the foe, using his Warfare Lore skill modifier in place of his Intimidation skill.

ability.name: Quick Block
ability.text: At the start of his turn, Hrungul gains an additional reaction that he can use only to Shield Block.
